statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 10 \\ 6 \\ -14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ -19 \\ -5 \\ 25 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -66 \\ 59 \\ 29 \\ -81 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
